Skip to the main content Skip to the visit us section Skip to the footer 
Delicious Egyptian Pies and More...

Experience the taste of Egypt with our authentic pies, mouthwatering pizzas, oriental desserts, and refreshing fresh juices. Visit us at 2578 Ashley River Rd, Suite I, Charleston.
See Menu 
Order Online Now!

Order your favorite Egyptian pies, pizzas, and oriental desserts online for a quick and convenient meal. Simply browse our menu, select your items, and enjoy the flavors of Egypt from the comfort of your own home!
order now!!!

A larger version of the classic, creamy Roman cheese and vegetable pie, perfect for sharing.

Our Gallery

About Us

At Egy Dough, we specialize in serving authentic Egyptian pies, mouthwatering pizzas, and delightful oriental desserts. Our mission is to bring the taste of Egypt to Charleston by using only fresh ingredients and traditional recipes passed down through generations.

Discover Authentic Egyptian Cuisine

Embark on a culinary journey to Egypt at Egy Dough. From savory pies filled with aromatic spices to cheesy pizzas bursting with flavors, every dish is crafted with love and authenticity.

Visit Us

2578 ASHLEY RIVER RD, CHARLESTON, SC 29414, US

SUITE I

Phone: +1(843)225-4690

Email us:
[email protected] 
Monday 7:00 AM-10:00 PM (Breakfast ONLY till 11 AM)

About Us

At Egy Dough, we specialize in serving authentic Egyptian pies, mouthwatering pizzas, and delightful oriental desserts. Our mission is to bring the taste of Egypt to Charleston by using only fresh ingredients and traditional recipes passed down through generations.

Discover Authentic Egyptian Cuisine

Embark on a culinary journey to Egypt at Egy Dough. From savory pies filled with aromatic spices to cheesy pizzas bursting with flavors, every dish is crafted with love and authenticity.
